ai-patthana21.42:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.42:0.3_0: He should apply himself to form, thinking: “Take bried together.”
ai-patthana21.42:3.1_0: One who doesn’t desire, affection, infatuation, thirst, passion, attachment, and craving for the form of a faction.
ai-patthana21.42:3.1_1: (This should be expanded as for the three kinds of textual analysis.)
ai-patthana21.42:4.1_0: There is no cause or condition for desire, affection, and infatuation of thirst.
ai-patthana21.42:4.1_1: (This is the same as the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.42:5.1_0: if there is no Reciation of non-existence, not the teaching; and the causeing of hospitality, not the reason for the sake of a cause, for the sake of not the reason.
ai-patthana21.42:5.1_1: (This is the same as the previous discourse.)
